title: Did Trump Brag He Had the ‘Tallest Building in Manhattan’ After the 9/11 Attacks?
subtitle: Donald Trump spoke of having the tallest building in downtown Manhattan after the 9/11 attacks, but whether he was "bragging" is in the eye of the beholder.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Donald Trump bragged that he had tallest building in downtown Manhattan after the 9/11 attacks destroyed the World Trade Center.
